meta.name: google-site-verification

span.span: Effective Monday, March 16, 2020 Avella Area School District is closed through Sunday, March 29, 2020. This includes all campus facilities, extracurricular activities and events. In addition public visitation is not permitted during this time. Changes to this closure will be communicated through the school messenger system and posted on this website.

Avella Area School District's regularly scheduled board meeting for Wednesday, April 15, 2020 at 7:00 PM will be conducted virtually, using Zoom video conferencing. You may view and/or participate in this meeting virtually. We will post the link for this meeting on our District website by 6:30 PM on Wednesday, April 15, 2020.
Please email any questions to: waltherc@avellasd.org
Welcome to the Avella Area School District

“The Avella Area School District, in collaboration with students, parents and the community is committed to developing 21st century learning and thinking skills through a rigorous, relevant, and comprehensive curriculum, while preparing students to be innovative, productive citizens in an interconnected world.”
Congratulations to Julian Moore (113), 3rd place WPIAL Wrestling and Robbie West (220), 4th place WPIAL Wrestling

p.span: The Avella Area School District is looking for substitute secretaries, aides, cafeteria workers and custodians. The substitute rate is $9.00 per hour. If you have an interest, please complete the attached application and return to :
Avella Area School District, Central Administration Office

span.span:
20-21 Kindergarten Registration
March 19-20, 2020
Please call 724-356-2294 for an appointment
Avella Area School District Comprehensive Plan (Click Here)
The Avella Area School District Comprehensive Plan is available for public review in our building offices.

p.span: The Avella Area School District is committed to ensuring that all information placed on its website is accessible to individuals with disabilities. If you have a disability and the format of any material on our website interferes with your ability to access the information, please contact Mr. Cyril Walther: waltherc@avellasd.org. To enable Avella Area School District to respond in a manner most helpful to you, please indicate the nature of the accessibility problem, the web address of the requested material, your preferred format in which you want to receive the material (electronic format (ASCII, etc.), standard print, large print, etc.), and your contact information.
